price: ¡Señor nuestro! Creemos en lo que has revelado y seguimos a Tu Profeta. Cuéntanos entre los que dan testimonio de fe".
arabic: رَبَّنَآ ءَامَنَّا بِمَآ أَنزَلۡتَ وَٱتَّبَعۡنَا ٱلرَّسُولَ فَٱكۡتُبۡنَا مَعَ ٱلشَّٰهِدِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā āmannā bimā anzalta wa-ittabaʿnā al-rasūla fa-uk'tub'nā maʿa al-shāhidīna
